nodes.text: Ventil Tamplin was a male Nikto Ragtag cudgel who lived on Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, Ventil Tamplin and Lilea Norith were leading a group of Ragtag cudgels in the city of Doaba Guerfel. Circa 1 ABY, they harassed the small-time thug Lilith Laughlin because they suspected her to be an informant for the Corellian Security Force. In fact, they were right and Laughlin was actually working for the CorSec. During the CorSec investigation against the criminal organization known as the Chirq Council, Captain Vitala Baize needed information from Lilith Laughlin. She thus dispatched an agent to deal with her Ragtag problem. The CorSec agent fought the Ragtag cudgels who bothered the informant and killed some of them, including Ventil Tamplin.

Ventil Tamplin was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Ventil Tamplin was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
